requirement.title: Happy-path Test Generation From Approved API Order
requirement.goal: Generate happy-path test cases theo dung AppliedOrder da duoc user xac nhan o FE-05A.

inScope: Cap nhat TestSuite status sang Ready khi generation thanh cong.

acceptanceCriteria: AC-01: FE-05B block neu gate fail.
AC-02: FE-05B generate theo thu tu AppliedOrder.
AC-03: Happy-path test request values su dung schema-valid defaults.
